links.source: RFC225_Breakdown_UseCase:{{"content":"\n### （三）投标方就合同约定内容出现的故障提供紧急维修服务，故障问题响应时间不超过3 小时，故障问题解决时间不超过3 小时；非工作时间故障处理人员到达现场时间不超过8 小时。\n","tags":[{"level":3,"tag":"（三）投标方就合同约定内容出现的故障提供紧急维修服务，故障问题响应时间不超过3 小时，故障问题解决时间不超过3 小时；非工作时间故障处理人员到达现场时间不超过8 小时。"},{"level":2,"tag":"八、售后服务"}]}}
links.target: RFC225_Breakdown_UseCase:{{"use_cases":[{"use_case":"Provide emergency maintenance services for faults as per contract terms","references":["投标方就合同约定内容出现的故障提供紧急维修服务","故障问题响应时间不超过3 小时，故障问题解决时间不超过3 小时；非工作时间故障处理人员到达现场时间不超过8 小时。"],"reason":"To ensure that the bidding party provides timely emergency maintenance services for faults as per the contract terms, with specific response and resolution timeframes.","tags":[{"level":3,"tag":"（三）投标方就合同约定内容出现的故障提供紧急维修服务，故障问题响应时间不超过3 小时，故障问题解决时间不超过3 小时；非工作时间故障处理人员到达现场时间不超过8 小时。"},{"level":2,"tag":"八、售后服务"}]}]}}

links.source: RFC225_Breakdown_UseCase:{{"content":"\n### （四）在保修期内，投标方必须对所有软件和系统提供定期的预防性维护和临时性紧急维护服务。招标方随时提出临时性紧急维护要求投标方必须承诺做出回应，并派出工程师进行现场支持。\n","tags":[{"level":3,"tag":"（四）在保修期内，投标方必须对所有软件和系统提供定期的预防性维护和临时性紧急维护服务。招标方随时提出临时性紧急维护要求投标方必须承诺做出回应，并派出工程师进行现场支持。"},{"level":2,"tag":"八、售后服务"}]}}
links.target: RFC225_Breakdown_UseCase:{{"use_cases":[{"use_case":"Provide regular preventive maintenance and emergency maintenance services for all software and systems during the warranty period","references":["在保修期内，投标方必须对所有软件和系统提供定期的预防性维护和临时性紧急维护服务。"],"reason":"This use case outlines the requirement for the vendor to provide regular preventive maintenance and emergency maintenance services for all software and systems during the warranty period.","tags":[{"level":3,"tag":"（四）在保修期内，投标方必须对所有软件和系统提供定期的预防性维护和临时性紧急维护服务。招标方随时提出临时性紧急维护要求投标方必须承诺做出回应，并派出工程师进行现场支持。"},{"level":2,"tag":"八、售后服务"}]},{"use_case":"Commit to responding to ad-hoc emergency maintenance requests and dispatching engineers for on-site support","references":["招标方随时提出临时性紧急维护要求投标方必须承诺做出回应，并派出工程师进行现场支持。"],"reason":"This use case highlights the expectation for the vendor to commit to responding to ad-hoc emergency maintenance requests and dispatching engineers for on-site support as and when required by the contracting party.","tags":[{"level":3,"tag":"（四）在保修期内，投标方必须对所有软件和系统提供定期的预防性维护和临时性紧急维护服务。招标方随时提出临时性紧急维护要求投标方必须承诺做出回应，并派出工程师进行现场支持。"},{"level":2,"tag":"八、售后服务"}]}]}}

links.source: RFC225_Breakdown_UseCase:{{"content":"\n### （五）投标方需在维保期内免费赠送一定数量的人月用于系统的持续完善改进，并说明维保期到期后的维护服务内容和商务条件。\n","tags":[{"level":3,"tag":"（五）投标方需在维保期内免费赠送一定数量的人月用于系统的持续完善改进，并说明维保期到期后的维护服务内容和商务条件。"},{"level":2,"tag":"八、售后服务"}]}}
links.target: RFC225_Breakdown_UseCase:{{"use_cases":[{"use_case":"Provide free person-months for continuous improvement during the maintenance period","references":["投标方需在维保期内免费赠送一定数量的人月用于系统的持续完善改进"],"reason":"To ensure that the system is continuously improved and enhanced during the maintenance period without incurring additional costs.","tags":[{"level":3,"tag":"（五）投标方需在维保期内免费赠送一定数量的人月用于系统的持续完善改进，并说明维保期到期后的维护服务内容和商务条件。"},{"level":2,"tag":"八、售后服务"}]},{"use_case":"Detail the maintenance services and commercial terms after the maintenance period","references":["并说明维保期到期后的维护服务内容和商务条件"],"reason":"To clarify the scope of maintenance services and the commercial terms that will apply after the maintenance period, ensuring transparency and understanding for all parties involved.","tags":[{"level":3,"tag":"（五）投标方需在维保期内免费赠送一定数量的人月用于系统的持续完善改进，并说明维保期到期后的维护服务内容和商务条件。"},{"level":2,"tag":"八、售后服务"}]}]}}

links.source: RFC225_Breakdown_UseCase:OriginalRequirementList
links.target: RFC225_Breakdown_UseCase:{{"use_cases":[{"use_case":"Upgrade system interface to align with modern internet design standards","references":["系统功能繁琐，界面老旧，与现有互联网简洁风格不符"],"reason":"The current system interface is outdated and does not match the modern internet design standards, which affects user experience and usability.","tags":[{"level":2,"tag":"一、项目背景"}]},{"use_case":"Implement standardized marketing functions to provide guidance for frontline staff","references":["系统缺乏标准化营销功能，无法对一线员工提供营销指导","我行员工普遍年轻化，营销经验不足，急需系统为其将名下客户归类化、标签化，利用分析客户潜在营销机会，记录营销过程，提高营销成功率"],"reason":"The system lacks standardized marketing functions, which hinders the ability to provide marketing guidance to young frontline staff and utilize customer data for improved marketing success.","tags":[{"level":2,"tag":"一、项目背景"}]},{"use_case":"Enhance flexibility in data statistics and reporting capabilities","references":["数据统计不够灵活","未来系统应基于现有标签及归类，能提供满足各级灵活需求的报表能力"],"reason":"The current system's data statistics and reporting capabilities are not flexible enough to meet the varying needs of different levels within the organization.","tags":[{"level":2,"tag":"一、项目背景"}]},{"use_case":"Introduce line management functions to support the development of financial manager lines","references":["缺乏条线管理功能","我行正大力推进理财经理条线建设，迫切需要系统提供条线管理功能，包括但不限于人员管理、客户管理、任务分配、营销追踪、业绩统计、报告生成等功能"],"reason":"The system lacks line management functions, which are essential for supporting the development and management of financial manager lines within the organization.","tags":[{"level":2,"tag":"一、项目背景"}]},{"use_case":"Improve marketing process tracking links.source: RFC225_Breakdown_UseCase_Reference:{{"use_case":"Integrate a management module for financial managers to support task management, marketing activity configuration, and real-time tracking of marketing processes.","references":["提供理财经理管理模块，满足行方条线管理","按照我行理财经理管理路径，设计理财经理条线模块，整合功能包括但不限于任务查询、提醒设置、日常任务配置、营销活动配置、请假申请、提醒信息、创建手工任务、日常任务配置审核、手工任务认领、提醒任务配置、提醒任务审核等."],"reason":"To streamline financial manager operations and enhance marketing efficiency.","tags":[{"level":3,"tag":"（一）系统总体目标"},{"level":2,"tag":"二、项目目标"}]}}

links.source: RFC225_Breakdown_UseCase_Reference:{{"use_case":"Integrate a management module for financial managers to support task management, marketing activity configuration, and real-time tracking of marketing processes.","references":["提供理财经理管理模块，满足行方条线管理","按照我行理财经理管理路径，设计理财经理条线模块，整合功能包括但不限于任务查询、提醒设置、日常任务配置、营销活动配置、请假申请、提醒信息、创建手工任务、日常任务配置审核、手工任务认领、提醒任务配置、提醒任务审核等."],"reason":"To streamline financial manager operations and enhance marketing efficiency.","tags":[{"level":3,"tag":"（一）系统总体目标"},{"level":2,"tag":"二、项目目标"}]}}
links.target: RFC225_Breakdown_UseCase_Reference:{{"reference":"按照我行理财经理管理路径，设计理财经理条线模块，整合功能包括但不限于任务查询、提醒设置、日常任务配置、营销活动配置、请假申请、提醒信息、创建手工任务、日常任务配置审核、手工任务认领、提醒任务配置、提醒任务审核等.","is_issue":false,"issue":null,"is_todo":true,"todo":"设计理财经理条线模块，整合功能包括但不限于任务查询、提醒设置、日常任务配置、营销活动配置、请假申请、提醒信息、创建手工任务、日常任务配置审核、手工任务认领、提醒任务配置、提醒任务审核","is_effect":false,"effect":null,"is_constraint":false,"constraint":null,"reason":"The 'Use Case' does not explicitly address the issue, specify how the requirement should be done, state what effect the requirement requires, or declare what constraints need to necessitate."}}

links.source: RFC225_Breakdown_UseCase_Reference:{{"use_case":"Provide real-time tracking of marketing processes, including monitoring client asset changes, alerting for significant changes, and recording marketing activities for predictive and timely client management.","references":["实时追踪营销过程，突出过程管理","系统监控客户各项资产情况变动情况（实时），对客户大额变动（10 万以上）进行弹窗预警、短信预警、邮件预警。系统能有效记录理财经理营销轨迹，包括但不限于电话（链接外呼）、短信（短信平台）等，提供关键字记录（理财经理输入一段文字后，系统检索内关键字，例如采集到活期，系统自动跟着客户活期变动情况，以七天为周期为频率，检索客户活期变动情况，±20%之内显示无变动，超出部分显示本次营销成功与否），实现客户管理的预见性、及时性，简化使用者感受."],"reason":"To enhance client management and marketing effectiveness through real-time tracking and predictive analysis.","tags":[{"level":3,"tag":"（一）系统总体目标"},{"level":2,"tag":"二、项目目标"}]}}
links.target: RFC225_Breakdown_UseCase_Reference:{{"reference":"实时追踪营销过程，突出过程管理","is_issue":false,"issue":null,"is_todo":false,"todo":null,"is_effect":true,"effect":"实时追踪营销过程","is_constraint":false,"constraint":null,"reason":"The 'Use Case' explicitly states the effect of the requirement, which is to track marketing processes in real time."}}

It also specifies the effect of achieving proactive and timely customer management and simplifying user experience."}}

links.source: RFC225_Breakdown_UseCase_Reference:{{"use_case":"Develop a mobile CRM system with integration capabilities for enterprise WeChat, enabling client managers to perform various marketing activities and access performance rankings on the go.","references":["提供手机版CRM，支持对接企业微信","手机版CRM，主要用于采集理财经理拜访客户定位、客户经理拨打电话、发送短信记录，支持拍照上传、按预设的业绩指标进行排名展现等功能。系统除支持植入我行现有APP 外还需具备对接企业微信能力，包括但不限于对接外呼系统、短信平台、企业微信，采集客户经理营销情况，便捷客户经理操作."],"reason":"To enable client managers to perform marketing activities and access relevant data while on the move.","tags":[{"level":3,"tag":"（一）系统总体目标"},{"level":2,"tag":"二、项目目标"}]}}

It should also support photo uploading, ranking display based on preset performance indicators, and integration with the enterprise WeChat for customer manager marketing data collection and convenient operations.","is_constraint":false,"constraint":null,"reason":"The use case does not explicitly address the issue, specify how the requirement should be done, or state any constraints."}}

links.source: RFC225_Breakdown_UseCase_Reference:{{"use_case":"Implement specialized modules for key client groups, providing tailored data presentation, characteristic analysis, and marketing opportunities.","references":["重点客群功能","参考业内开发经验，精选重点客群模块（例如代发薪客群等），系统预设专业化的页面及功能，提供针对该客群的数据展现、特点分析、营销商机、营销建议等功能."],"reason":"To cater to the specific needs of key client groups and enhance marketing effectiveness.","tags":[{"level":3,"tag":"（一）系统总体目标"},{"level":2,"tag":"二、项目目标"}]}}

links.source: RFC225_Breakdown_UseCase_Reference:{{"use_case":"Implement specialized modules for key client groups, providing tailored data presentation, characteristic analysis, and marketing opportunities.","references":["重点客群功能","参考业内开发经验，精选重点客群模块（例如代发薪客群等），系统预设专业化的页面及功能，提供针对该客群的数据展现、特点分析、营销商机、营销建议等功能."],"reason":"To cater to the specific needs of key client groups and enhance marketing effectiveness.","tags":[{"level":3,"tag":"（一）系统总体目标"},{"level":2,"tag":"二、项目目标"}]}}

links.source: RFC225_Breakdown_UseCase_Reference:{{"use_case":"Integrate external and internal data platforms to enrich the tag system and provide standardized marketing processes, enabling comprehensive client manager management.","references":["对接外部数据及大数据平台，提供标准化营销流程","对接外部数据及行内大数据平台，包括但不限于行业内存款产品数据、理财产品数据、贷款产品数据、合法且可供使用的相关客户数据等并根据数据分析整合内外部数据，丰富标签体系，提供营销建议。提供标准化营销流程，以贷款为例，从“潜力客户（符合产品条件）—意向客户（客户有购买意向）—促成客户（行方有销售意向）—审批阶段（报送材料审批）—结束（审批通过），对每个环节提供营销建议并追踪环节，形成客户经理、支行、分行、全行多维度报告，满足行方客户经理管理要求."],"reason":"To provide comprehensive marketing support and client manager management.","tags":[{"level":3,"tag":"（一）系统总体目标"},{"level":2,"tag":"二、项目目标"}]}}
links.target: RFC225_Breakdown_UseCase_Reference:{{"reference":"对接外部数据及大数据平台，提供标准化营销流程","is_issue":false,"issue":null,"is_todo":true,"todo":"The Use Case does not explicitly specify how the requirement of integrating external data and big data platforms to provide standardized marketing processes should be done.","is_effect":true,"effect":"The Use Case explicitly states the effect of the requirement, which is to provide standardized marketing processes for integrating external data and big data platforms.","is_constraint":false,"constraint":null,"reason":"The Use Case does not explicitly address any issues or constraints related to the requirement."}}

links.source: RFC225_Breakdown_UseCase_Reference:{{"use_case":"Integrate a comprehensive client manager workbench with coverage of wealth-related and marketing-related alerts, as well as loan risk management, to provide a single system for client managers to access dynamic client information.","references":["集成化客户经理工作台，信息提示全覆盖","该系统除为客户经理推送客户财富类、营销类相关提醒外，需集成贷款风险管理，涵盖预警信号处理、催收、贷后记录等信息，整合行内多个风险提示，满足客户经理使用单一系统即可全面掌握客户动态信息."],"reason":"To streamline client manager operations and enhance client information access.","tags":[{"level":3,"tag":"（一）系统总体目标"},{"level":2,"tag":"二、项目目标"}]}}

links.target: RFC225_Breakdown_UseCase_Reference:{{"reference":"该系统除为客户经理推送客户财富类、营销类相关提醒外，需集成贷款风险管理，涵盖预警信号处理、催收、贷后记录等信息，整合行内多个风险提示，满足客户经理使用单一系统即可全面掌握客户动态信息.","is_issue":true,"issue":"该系统需集成贷款风险管理，涵盖预警信号处理、催收、贷后记录等信息","is_todo":false,"todo":null,"is_effect":true,"effect":"满足客户经理使用单一系统即可全面掌握客户动态信息","is_constraint":false,"constraint":null,"reason":"The 'Use Case' explicitly addresses the issue of integrating loan risk management and the effect of enabling customer managers to comprehensively understand customer dynamic information."}}

links.source: RFC225_Breakdown_UseCase_Reference:{{"use_case":"Display comprehensive customer information for retail and corporate clients, with role-based access control for different user roles.","references":["基于整合的客户数据，360 度全面展现客户信息，让客户管理及营销人员能够全面及时了解客户的基础情况。","系统支持根据不同角色对于客户信息获取的需求及信息安全性的规范要求，对客户视图的各信息模块拥有不同的角色权限。"],"reason":"To ensure that customer management and marketing personnel can access and understand comprehensive and timely customer information, while adhering to role-based access control for security and privacy.","tags":[{"level":2,"tag":"二、项目目标"},{"level":3,"tag":"（二）业务功能需求"}]}}

links.source: RFC225_Breakdown_UseCase_Reference:{{"use_case":"Implement modular design to enable high reusability and low impact of local changes on the system.","references":["模块化。系统参数化、构件化程度高，局部的变更对系统的影响程度低，能通过参数设置来对系统进行控制。通过模块标准化设计尽量复用公共模块，使日后新增应用也可复用公共模块，减少重复开发工作量；"],"reason":"To reduce development workload and enable easy addition of new applications by reusing common modules.","tags":[{"level":2,"tag":"三、技术需求"},{"level":3,"tag":"（一）项目建设原则"}]}}

links.source: RFC225_Breakdown_UseCase_Reference:{{"use_case":"Adhere to the bank's IT design principles and regulatory requirements, including data standards, architectural standards, and tool usage requirements.","references":["规范性。系统设计、功能必须满足九江银行规范管理要求，必须符合我行的IT设计原则，包括不限于数据规范、架构规范、工具使用要求等；"],"reason":"To ensure compliance with the bank's standards and regulatory requirements.","tags":[{"level":2,"tag":"三、技术需求"},{"level":3,"tag":"（一）项目建设原则"}]}}

links.source: RFC225_Breakdown_UseCase_Reference:{{"use_case":"Support integration with international and domestic standard hardware and software platforms, and ensure independence from single hardware suppliers.","references":["开放性。系统可以集成符合国际国内标准的软硬件平台和产品，设备管理、系统扩容和业务维护不依赖于单一软硬件供应商的产品，数据库系统应支持跨平台开发；"],"reason":"To facilitate flexibility, scalability, and independence from specific hardware vendors.","tags":[{"level":2,"tag":"三、技术需求"},{"level":3,"tag":"（一）项目建设原则"}]}}

links.target: RFC225_Breakdown_UseCase_Reference:{{"reference":"先进性。采用先进的基于计算机网络的软件、硬件产品及模块化的软硬件设计，保证系统在技术上的领先；","is_issue":false,"issue":null,"is_todo":false,"todo":null,"is_effect":true,"effect":"采用先进的基于计算机网络的软件、硬件产品及模块化的软硬件设计，保证系统在技术上的领先","is_constraint":false,"constraint":null,"reason":"The 'Use Case' explicitly states the effect of ensuring the system's technological advancement through the use of advanced computer network-based software, hardware products, and modular software and hardware design."}}

links.source: RFC225_Breakdown_UseCase_Reference:{{"use_case":"Ensure good scalability and ease of system upgrades and updates to accommodate evolving business needs.","references":["扩展性。软件、硬件平台在系统容量、处理能力和业务应用等方面应具有良好的可扩充、扩展能力，能够方便地进行系统升级和更新，以适应业务量的不断发展；系统软硬件升级平稳简单，升级测试简单，新模块上线不影响正常应用。系统具备很好的开放性，便于与其他系统对接，支持在现有产品上快速定制化开发适配新的需求，扩展性好。"],"reason":"To ensure the system can adapt to changing business requirements and facilitate seamless upgrades and updates.","tags":[{"level":2,"tag":"三、技术需求"},{"level":3,"tag":"（一）项目建设原则"}]}}
links.target: RFC225_Breakdown_UseCase_Reference:{{"reference":"扩展性。软件、硬件平台在系统容量、处理能力和业务应用等方面应具有良好的可扩充、扩展能力，能够方便地进行系统升级和更新，以适应业务量的不断发展；系统软硬件升级平稳简单，升级测试简单，新模块上线不影响正常应用。系统具备很好的开放性，便于与其他系统对接，支持在现有产品上快速定制化开发适配新的需求，扩展性好。","is_issue":true,"issue":"软件、硬件平台在系统容量、处理能力和业务应用等方面应具有良好的可扩充、扩展能力，能够方便地进行系统升级和更新，以适应业务量的不断发展；系统软硬件升级平稳简单，升级测试简单，新模块上线不影响正常应用。系统具备很好的开放性，便于与其他系统对接，支持在现有产品上快速定制化开发适配新的需求，扩展性好。","is_todo":false,"todo":null,"is_effect":false,"effect":null,"is_constraint":false,"constraint":null,"reason":"The 'Use Case' explicitly addresses the issue of having good scalability and expandability in software and hardware platforms, as well as the ease of system upgrades and updates to adapt to the continuous growth of business volume."}}

links.source: RFC225_Breakdown_UseCase_Reference:{{"use_case":"Implement comprehensive security measures including access control, data encryption, and secure data transmission and storage.","references":["安全性。充分考虑整个系统运行的安全策略和机制，可以根据不同的业务要求和应用处理，设置不同的安全权限，采取分级分层授权，数据加密传输以及关键数据加密存储；"],"reason":"To protect the system from security threats and ensure data confidentiality and integrity.","tags":[{"level":2,"tag":"三、技术需求"},{"level":3,"tag":"（一）项目建设原则"}]}}
links.target: RFC225_Breakdown_UseCase_Reference:{{"reference":"安全性。充分考虑整个系统运行的安全策略和机制，可以根据不同的业务要求和应用处理，设置不同的安全权限，采取分级分层授权，数据加密传输以及关键数据加密存储；","is_issue":false,"issue":null,"is_todo":false,"todo":null,"is_effect":true,"effect":"充分考虑整个系统运行的安全策略和机制，可以根据不同的业务要求和应用处理，设置不同的安全权限，采取分级分层授权，数据加密传输以及关键数据加密存储","is_constraint":false,"constraint":null,"reason":"The 'Use Case' explicitly states the effect of considering security measures for the entire system, including setting different security permissions based on business requirements, implementing hierarchical authorization, and encrypting data transmission and storage for critical data."}}

links.source: RFC225_Breakdown_UseCase_Reference_Effect:{{"use_case":"Provide real-time tracking of marketing processes, including monitoring client asset changes, alerting for significant changes, and recording marketing activities for predictive and timely client management.","references":["实时追踪营销过程，突出过程管理","系统监控客户各项资产情况变动情况（实时），对客户大额变动（10 万以上）进行弹窗预警、短信预警、邮件预警。系统能有效记录理财经理营销轨迹，包括但不限于电话（链接外呼）、短信（短信平台）等，提供关键字记录（理财经理输入一段文字后，系统检索内关键字，例如采集到活期，系统自动跟着客户活期变动情况，以七天为周期为频率，检索客户活期变动情况，±20%之内显示无变动，超出部分显示本次营销成功与否），实现客户管理的预见性、及时性，简化使用者感受."],"reason":"To enhance client management and marketing effectiveness through real-time tracking and predictive analysis.","tags":[{"level":3,"tag":"（一）系统总体目标"},{"level":2,"tag":"二、项目目标"}]}}

links.target: RFC225_Breakdown_UseCase_Reference_Reference:{{"is_clear":true,"is_actionable":true,"data_for_checks":["Client asset changes can be obtained from the system's database or through real-time data feeds from financial institutions.","Marketing activities can be recorded through the system's activity logs or by integrating with marketing platforms such as call center systems and SMS platforms."],"measurement_tools_and_methods":["Real-time monitoring of client asset changes can be achieved through database triggers or real-time data streaming technologies.","Alerting for significant changes can be implemented using threshold-based triggers and notification systems.","Recording marketing activities can be done through activity logging features within the CRM system or by integrating with external marketing platforms."],"indicators":["Key performance indicators (KPIs) for client asset changes, such as frequency of monitoring, threshold for significant changes, and accuracy of alerts.","Key metrics for marketing activities, including the volume of interactions, success rates of marketing campaigns, and predictive analysis of client responses."],"avoiding_subjective_issues":["Implement automated monitoring and alerting systems to reduce reliance on manual intervention and subjective judgment.","Utilize standardized recording and tracking mechanisms for marketing activities to ensure consistency and objectivity in measurement results."],"criteria":["The system should provide real-time monitoring of client asset changes and alerting for significant changes based on predefined thresholds.","Marketing activities should be accurately recorded and tracked to enable predictive and timely client management."],"quality_requirements":["The real-time monitoring and alerting mechanisms should have high accuracy and minimal latency to ensure timely response to client asset changes.","The recording and tracking of marketing activities should be comprehensive and reliable to support predictive client management."]}}

links.source: RFC225_Breakdown_UseCase_Reference_ToDo:{{"use_case":"Develop a mobile CRM system with integration capabilities for enterprise WeChat, enabling client managers to perform various marketing activities and access performance rankings on the go.","references":["提供手机版CRM，支持对接企业微信","手机版CRM，主要用于采集理财经理拜访客户定位、客户经理拨打电话、发送短信记录，支持拍照上传、按预设的业绩指标进行排名展现等功能。系统除支持植入我行现有APP 外还需具备对接企业微信能力，包括但不限于对接外呼系统、短信平台、企业微信，采集客户经理营销情况，便捷客户经理操作."],"reason":"To enable client managers to perform marketing activities and access relevant data while on the move.","tags":[{"level":3,"tag":"（一）系统总体目标"},{"level":2,"tag":"二、项目目标"}]}}

links.source: RFC225_Breakdown_UseCase_Reference_ToDo:{{"use_case":"Integrate external and internal data platforms to enrich the tag system and provide standardized marketing processes, enabling comprehensive client manager management.","references":["对接外部数据及大数据平台，提供标准化营销流程","对接外部数据及行内大数据平台，包括但不限于行业内存款产品数据、理财产品数据、贷款产品数据、合法且可供使用的相关客户数据等并根据数据分析整合内外部数据，丰富标签体系，提供营销建议。提供标准化营销流程，以贷款为例，从“潜力客户（符合产品条件）—意向客户（客户有购买意向）—促成客户（行方有销售意向）—审批阶段（报送材料审批）—结束（审批通过），对每个环节提供营销建议并追踪环节，形成客户经理、支行、分行、全行多维度报告，满足行方客户经理管理要求."],"reason":"To provide comprehensive marketing support and client manager management.","tags":[{"level":3,"tag":"（一）系统总体目标"},{"level":2,"tag":"二、项目目标"}]}}

links.source: RFC225_Breakdown_UseCase_Reference_Reference:{{"use_case":"Ensure system performance meets Jiujang Bank's future business needs, and provide performance benchmark reports and analysis based on specified performance indicators.","references":["系统性能需要满足九江银行业务未来数年的使用需求，投标方提供至少一份产品性能基准报告（最好有第三方的测试报告），提供产品性能测试的环境背景，包括但不限于软硬件具体配置、用户数、交易响应情况等，提供达到性能基准测试结果的细节，基准报告结果包括但不限于实时、高并发及批量处理测试场景下的性能测试。","系统性能分析指标需满足九江银行各项规则规定，包括但不限于以下性能指标要求进行分析："],"reason":"To ensure the system can handle future business needs and comply with Jiujang Bank's performance requirements.","tags":[{"level":2,"tag":"三、技术需求"},{"level":3,"tag":"（二）技术需求"}]}}

links.source: RFC225_Breakdown_UseCase_Reference_Effect:{{"use_case":"Provide lifetime quality assurance for the supplied products","references":["投标方需负责所提供产品的终身质量保障。"],"reason":"To ensure that the products have a guaranteed quality throughout their lifetime and to hold the bidding party accountable for the quality of the products.","tags":[{"level":3,"tag":"（二）要求投标方提供为期2 年（自项目最终验收上线后的24 个月）的免费维保期。在维保期内投标方需提供产品版本的免费升级和保修服务，承诺7*24小时的技术支持或现场维护，现场维护须24 小时内到场，6 小时解决问题，重大活动期间的驻现场服务。提供支持服务的方式包括但不限于：热线电话、电子邮件、现场技术支持、软件修补包等。"},{"level":3,"tag":"（一）投标方需负责所提供产品的终身质量保障。"},{"level":2,"tag":"八、售后服务"}]}}

links.target: RFC225_Breakdown_UseCase_Reference_Reference:{{"is_clear":true,"is_actionable":true,"data_for_checks":["The data for checks can be obtained by reviewing the contract or agreement between the bidding party and the client, which should clearly outline the terms and conditions for the free product upgrades and warranty services during the maintenance period."],"measurement_tools_and_methods":["Review the contract or agreement to ensure that it includes provisions for free product upgrades and warranty services during the maintenance period.","Conduct regular reviews and audits to verify that the bidding party is fulfilling their obligation to provide free product upgrades and warranty services as per the agreed terms."],"indicators":["Percentage of clients receiving free product upgrades and warranty services during the maintenance period","Number of reported cases of bidding party not providing free product upgrades and warranty services as per the agreement"],"avoiding_subjective_issues":["Ensure that the contract or agreement clearly defines the scope and terms of the free product upgrades and warranty services to minimize subjective interpretation.","Use standardized reporting and documentation processes to track and verify the provision of free product upgrades and warranty services."],"criteria":["The bidding party consistently provides free product upgrades and warranty services as per the agreed terms and conditions.","The bidding party responds promptly to requests for product upgrades and warranty services during the maintenance period."],"quality_requirements":["The free product upgrades and warranty services provided by the bidding party meet the specified quality standards and do not compromise the performance or functionality of the products.","The bidding party maintains a high level of customer satisfaction through the provision of timely and effective product upgrades and warranty services."]}}

links.source: RFC225_Breakdown_UseCase_Reference_Report:{{"use_case":"Provide real-time tracking of marketing processes, including monitoring client asset changes, alerting for significant changes, and recording marketing activities for predictive and timely client management.","references":["实时追踪营销过程，突出过程管理","系统监控客户各项资产情况变动情况（实时），对客户大额变动（10 万以上）进行弹窗预警、短信预警、邮件预警。系统能有效记录理财经理营销轨迹，包括但不限于电话（链接外呼）、短信（短信平台）等，提供关键字记录（理财经理输入一段文字后，系统检索内关键字，例如采集到活期，系统自动跟着客户活期变动情况，以七天为周期为频率，检索客户活期变动情况，±20%之内显示无变动，超出部分显示本次营销成功与否），实现客户管理的预见性、及时性，简化使用者感受."],"reason":"To enhance client management and marketing effectiveness through real-time tracking and predictive analysis.","tags":[{"level":3,"tag":"（一）系统总体目标"},{"level":2,"tag":"二、项目目标"}]}}

links.source: RFC225_Breakdown_UseCase_Reference_Report:{{"use_case":"Provide real-time tracking of marketing processes, including monitoring client asset changes, alerting for significant changes, and recording marketing activities for predictive and timely client management.","references":["实时追踪营销过程，突出过程管理","系统监控客户各项资产情况变动情况（实时），对客户大额变动（10 万以上）进行弹窗预警、短信预警、邮件预警。系统能有效记录理财经理营销轨迹，包括但不限于电话（链接外呼）、短信（短信平台）等，提供关键字记录（理财经理输入一段文字后，系统检索内关键字，例如采集到活期，系统自动跟着客户活期变动情况，以七天为周期为频率，检索客户活期变动情况，±20%之内显示无变动，超出部分显示本次营销成功与否），实现客户管理的预见性、及时性，简化使用者感受."],"reason":"To enhance client management and marketing effectiveness through real-time tracking and predictive analysis.","tags":[{"level":3,"tag":"（一）系统总体目标"},{"level":2,"tag":"二、项目目标"}]}}

links.source: RFC225_Breakdown_UseCase_Reference_Report:{{"use_case":"Integrate external and internal data platforms to enrich the tag system and provide standardized marketing processes, enabling comprehensive client manager management.","references":["对接外部数据及大数据平台，提供标准化营销流程","对接外部数据及行内大数据平台，包括但不限于行业内存款产品数据、理财产品数据、贷款产品数据、合法且可供使用的相关客户数据等并根据数据分析整合内外部数据，丰富标签体系，提供营销建议。提供标准化营销流程，以贷款为例，从“潜力客户（符合产品条件）—意向客户（客户有购买意向）—促成客户（行方有销售意向）—审批阶段（报送材料审批）—结束（审批通过），对每个环节提供营销建议并追踪环节，形成客户经理、支行、分行、全行多维度报告，满足行方客户经理管理要求."],"reason":"To provide comprehensive marketing support and client manager management.","tags":[{"level":3,"tag":"（一）系统总体目标"},{"level":2,"tag":"二、项目目标"}]}}

links.source: RFC225_Breakdown_UseCase_Reference_Report:{{"use_case":"Ensure good scalability and ease of system upgrades and updates to accommodate evolving business needs.","references":["扩展性。软件、硬件平台在系统容量、处理能力和业务应用等方面应具有良好的可扩充、扩展能力，能够方便地进行系统升级和更新，以适应业务量的不断发展；系统软硬件升级平稳简单，升级测试简单，新模块上线不影响正常应用。系统具备很好的开放性，便于与其他系统对接，支持在现有产品上快速定制化开发适配新的需求，扩展性好。"],"reason":"To ensure the system can adapt to changing business requirements and facilitate seamless upgrades and updates.","tags":[{"level":2,"tag":"三、技术需求"},{"level":3,"tag":"（一）项目建设原则"}]}}
